playn.core

Interface PlayN.LifecycleListener

  • Enclosing class:
    PlayN

    public static interface PlayN.LifecycleListener
    Used to receive lifecycle notifications. See PlayN.setLifecycleListener(playn.core.PlayN.LifecycleListener).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onExit()
      Called just before the game will be closed (on mobile and web platforms).
      void onPause()
      Called just before the game is paused (made non-active on mobile platforms).
      void onResume()
      Called just after the game is resumed (made active on mobile platforms).

    • Method Detail

      • onPause

        void onPause()
        Called just before the game is paused (made non-active on mobile platforms).

      • onResume

        void onResume()
        Called just after the game is resumed (made active on mobile platforms).

      • onExit

        void onExit()
        Called just before the game will be closed (on mobile and web platforms).
